name: Endeavour
description:
Your mission, and the mission of your 999,999 siblings, is to explore deeper and deeper into the furthest reaches of the galaxy.

You've been asleep a long while, but now you are at last approaching the Vela system.

But you'll be the first to set foot - well, wheel! - on these new worlds. Who knows what you might find!

----

Keyboard Controls:

Move spaceship:
WASD / Arrow keys / Left mouse button

Land  or Embark:
F

Pick up:
Space

Next dialogue:
Space

Dialogue choice:
A or B

----

Credits:

Made by @leekanarchism @binney @bens @scoobyben1 with a little guest graphics from @thjsmith

Soundtrack by @scoobyben1

----

Change log:

v12: fix potential soft locks for one puzzle
